vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732);
father of: Saul (H7586G)
Also named: Kis<\i> (Κίς "Kish" G2797)
§ Kish = "bent"
1) a Benjamite of the family of Matri, father of king Saul
2) an ancestor of Mordecai
3) son of Gibeon and brother of Abdon, Zur, Baal, Ner, Nadab, Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth; uncle of Kish the father of king Saul
4) a Merarite Levite, son of Mahli and grandson of Merari the progenitor of the family
5) a Merarite Levite, son of Abdi in the time of king Hezekiah of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín; (b)   hijo de Jehiel; ancestro de rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   hijo de Mahli; levita; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   hijo de Abdí; levita; en tiempos del rey Ezequías; (e)   ancestro de Mardoqueo; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基士 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "彎曲的"
1) 瑪特利族的便雅憫人, 掃羅王的父親
2) 末底改的祖先 {#斯 2:5|}
3) 利未人米拉利的子孫, 抹利的兒子, 米拉利(米拉利族的祖先)的孫子
4) 利未人米拉利的子孫, 亞伯底的兒子, 是在猶大希西家王統治時代{#代下 29:12|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基士 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "弯曲的"
1) 玛特利族的便雅悯人, 扫罗王的父亲
2) 末底改的祖先 {#斯 2:5|}
3) 利未人米拉利的子孙, 抹利的儿子, 米拉利(米拉利族的祖先)的孙子
4) 利未人米拉利的子孙, 亚伯底的儿子, 是在犹大希西家王统治时代{#代下 29:12|}

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.21;
son of: Mahli (H4249);
brother of: Libni (H3845H) and Eleazar (H0499J);
father of: Jerahmeel (H3396H)
§ Kish = "bent"
1) a Benjamite of the family of Matri, father of king Saul
2) an ancestor of Mordecai
3) son of Gibeon and brother of Abdon, Zur, Baal, Ner, Nadab, Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth; uncle of Kish the father of king Saul
4) a Merarite Levite, son of Mahli and grandson of Merari the progenitor of the family
5) a Merarite Levite, son of Abdi in the time of king Hezekiah of Judah

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.29.12;
son of: Abdi (H5660H)
§ Kish = "bent"
1) a Benjamite of the family of Matri, father of king Saul
2) an ancestor of Mordecai
3) son of Gibeon and brother of Abdon, Zur, Baal, Ner, Nadab, Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth; uncle of Kish the father of king Saul
4) a Merarite Levite, son of Mahli and grandson of Merari the progenitor of the family
5) a Merarite Levite, son of Abdi in the time of king Hezekiah of Judah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.2.5;
father of: Shimei (H8096U)
§ Kish = "bent"
1) a Benjamite of the family of Matri, father of king Saul
2) an ancestor of Mordecai
3) son of Gibeon and brother of Abdon, Zur, Baal, Ner, Nadab, Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth; uncle of Kish the father of king Saul
4) a Merarite Levite, son of Mahli and grandson of Merari the progenitor of the family
5) a Merarite Levite, son of Abdi in the time of king Hezekiah of Judah
